## HasEventListeners interface

Interface that demonstrates an event emitter with listener management

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HasEventListeners 
```

## Remarks

This interface demonstrates a common pattern where there are typed add/remove event listener functions that expect the listener to have a specific call signature

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [offEventOne](./package-callsignature.haseventlisteners.offeventone.md) | (listenerOne: [ListenerOne](./package-callsignature.listenerone.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | Removes a first listener |
|  [offEventTwo](./package-callsignature.haseventlisteners.offeventtwo.md) | (listenerTwo: [ListenerTwo](./package-callsignature.listenertwo.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | Removes a second listener |
|  [onEventOne](./package-callsignature.haseventlisteners.oneventone.md) | (listenerOne: [ListenerOne](./package-callsignature.listenerone.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | Adds a first listener |
|  [onEventTwo](./package-callsignature.haseventlisteners.oneventtwo.md) | (listenerTwo: [ListenerTwo](./package-callsignature.listenertwo.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | Adds a second listener |
